column: 1. Borrower has more than 2 live accounts
2. Borrower has live accounts from more than 2 credit grantors
3. One or more live accounts with Overdue Amount
4. Total Outstanding / Current Balance is more than INR 60,000
5. One or more live accounts with Written Off Status
6. One or more live accounts with Delinquent Status
7. One of the Co-borrowers in JLG Group is having Delinquent Status
8. One of the Co-borrowers in JLG Group is having Overdue Amount
